attributes.action: let Duane 'Dog' Chapman and his family into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: duane 'dog' chapman and his family have been denied visa's to the uk. this petition is to get the decision over-turned!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
